title: PBE taking 17 hours to download content
body: I downloaded the PBE client and I was able to log on and buy a few champs/skins. But I can't play because the game says it is only at 11% downloaded and 1087 minutes left. Any suggestions?

replies.body: The PBE download has been dragging behind for a lot of players simply due to the amount of traffic those servers have had to deal with. With PBE finally relaunching, a lot of players are trying to download and access that website all at once, which has bottlenecked the servers quite a bit.
